title: Snake game
article:
I created two versions of snake games.

First version written by javascript (es6). You can try it in browser [snake-game](https://hyrdbyrd.github.io/snake-game/dist/), and repos [snake-game](https://github.com/hyrdbyrd/snake-game).

Second version written by python 3. You can try it self just run it (you need python 3, and tkinter) [python-game](https://github.com/hyrdbyrd/python-game).

title: Newton reporter
article:
We're with team forked original [html-reporter](https://github.com/gemini-testing/html-reporter) repository and [upgrade](https://github.com/SukachevAlex/html-reporter) them!

That project were created during 2nd section of SHRI.

title: About me
article:
My name is Ilya Grinenko, I'm junior frontend (some backend) developer.

 I'm 16 years old and my love is JavaScript.
